name: picking
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
COMMERCE →
order picking
easy/rich pickings /ˈpɪkɪŋz/
a large range of good things to choose from: Investors have found rich pickings in the property market in recent years.
slim/lean/meagre pickings
a lack of good things to choose from: Even money-market funds offer slim pickings these days.
